member_organisations:
Institutional members (universities and business schools): http://www.ceeman.org/about-us/ceeman-members/ceeman-institutional-members 
 
Corporate members: http://www.ceeman.org/about-us/ceeman-members/ceeman-corporate-members 
 
Partner associations (reciprocal membership): http://www.ceeman.org/about-us/ceeman-members/ceeman-exchange-members
fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: CEEMAN occasionally contributes to Erasmus+ and other EU-funded projects in the area of education and management development.
organisation_name: CEEMAN - Ustanova za razvoj menedzmenta v Srednji in Vzhodnji Evropi (CEEMAN)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Besides reciprocal membership with a number of partner associations (http://www.ceeman.org/about-us/ceeman-members/ceeman-exchange-members), CEEMAN is also a full member of the International Network for Quality Assurance Agencies in Higher Education (INQAAHE) and affiliate member of The European Association for Quality Assurance in Higher Education (ENQA).
goals__remit: CEEMAN's objectives are to improve the quality of management development through education, research, consulting, information, networking support, and other related services for management development institutions and corporations operating in dynamically changing environments.
